modName: Lost And Found - Fuzzy Jarl Cloak NIF
summary: A wonderful mod-ready fuzzy cloak mesh from Bethesda\'s \"Lost And Found\".
descriptionHtml:
Just a mesh I came across while browsing Skyrim\'s directories. You will find it at \"(your unpacked Skyrim meshes)\\meshes\\clothes\\yarlclothes\\testyarl.nif\" but I attached the file for your convenience. I largely fail at meshing but it should be a matter of minutes to attach the mesh to the right bones/nodes and have a fully working fur cloak of excellent quality. 

I\'ll gladly do the texture work if someone sets up the mesh for me! Pretty please? ;-)

--

Edit: I applied the werewolf texture for a quick demonstration. It\'s not mapped correctly so that\'s why it doesn\'t look as good as it should, but you get the gist of what I\'m trying to do here :)
author: Bethesda
